description.p: Returns the logarithm (base 10) for a number.
A numeric field or value greater than 0.
Returns the logarithm (base 10) for a number.

discussion.p: The Log10 function returns the logarithm (base 10) for a number. The *[sql:Number]* should be greater than zero.

example.caption: Log10() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Log(1400) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 7.24422751560335
